title: Win big with this quiz on Chinese diplomacy
text:
chinadaily.com.cn | Updated: 2019-09-14 06:30

Click on the picture to take our special quiz on China's diplomacy and see big moments in the history of Chinese diplomacy.

This year marks the 70th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China. In the past seven decades, China's diplomacy has seen great progress. How much do you know about China's diplomacy? Do you know which country was the first to establish diplomatic ties with China?

Click here to participate in this quiz and you could win the ultimate prize — a copy of St Petersburg: Three Centuries of Murderous Desire by Jonathan Miles translated into Chinese. A Times Book of the Year 2017, this book helps readers understand the modern and contemporary history of St Petersburg and Russia.

A copy of St Petersburg: Three Centuries of Murderous Desire. Photo provided to chinadaily.com.cn

The Chinese version was published by Beijing Century Wenjing, a subsidiary of Shanghai People's Publishing House. It was officially launched in August and appeared at the Shanghai Book Fair.

We will choose five lucky readers who answered all the questions correctly at random to receive their prize.
